title: Hide And Seek A Custom Game
body:
Is Azir a good champion for hide and seek? His mobility and ultimate can really make him a good runner. 
I Dunno.

replies.body: Yeah I think he'd be pretty good considering with WE (midway through E > Q) can make you jump 2 walls at once. Just build some CDR.
azir wont be  a good runner because his e cdr is really long and can be stoped
